how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

info.url_png_icon_64x64: http(s) url to pool icon; not animated; max 40kb
info.url_png_logo: http(s) url to pool logo; not animated; max 50kb

about.me: Managed with passion by 1 devops and 2 secdevops engineers with more than 30 years of acumulated experience, using enterprise grade infraestructure, monitorization and security
about.server: Enterprise grade datacenter all servers with 4 dedicated cores, 8gb RAM as a minimum depending on workload and 1 Gigabyte of guaranteed network bandwidth
about.company: We are just Cardano supporters  :)  CardanoWorld.net

info.rss: http(s) url to valid RSS feed
